title: The estates of the hypocrite and syncere Christian Containing, certaine liuely differences, betweene synceritie and hypocrisie; very necessarie, for the tryall of our estates in Grace. By Tho. Cooper.
author: Cooper, Thomas, 1517?-1594.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Creede, for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the white Horse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
